name: Manifest Strike
options: Reduce the damage you take from the target’s next attack by 1d6

name: Wingburst
effect: Creatures take 2d8 thunder damage and are pushed 10 ft on a failed save; half damage and no push on a success.

name: Phantom Step
effect: You teleport up to 15 ft without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Screeching Pulse
effect: Target takes 2d6 psychic or thunder damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll on a failed save; half damage on a success.

name: Pressing Aura
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: Enemies within 5 ft have disadvantage on checks to move away; the first enemy that leaves your reach provokes an opportunity attack even if it Disengages.

name: Veil of the Watcher
effect: You impose disadvantage on the triggering attack roll. Must be used before the roll.

name: Grasping Shadow
effect: On a failed save, the creature’s speed is reduced by 10 ft and it has disadvantage on its next opportunity attack until the end of its next turn.

name: Flicker Guard
effect: Reduce damage by 1d6 + your Manifest Ability modifier. If reduced to 0, you may move 5 ft without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Rending Surge
effect: Deal +2d6 force damage, or knock a Large or smaller target prone instead.

name: Retaliatory Lash
effect: Make a melee weapon attack dealing normal damage +1d6 force. Cannot apply Manifest Strike.

name: Contract Mark
effect: Mark the creature. Its attacks against others have disadvantage; the first time it hits you again, reduce damage by 1d6. Only one creature may be marked.

name: Forced Interposition
effect: Swap places with an ally and become the target. Gain resistance and may use Guardian Intercept without extra ME.

name: Suppressive Pressure
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: Creatures within 5 ft have speed reduced by 10 ft. If they hit you, they take force damage equal to your Manifest Ability modifier.

name: Refusal to Fall
effect: When reduced to 0 HP, drop to 1 HP instead and hostile creatures within 5 ft take 2d8 thunder damage.

name: Warden’s Warning
effect: The attacker rerolls and takes the lower result. If the attack still hits, you gain temporary HP equal to your Manifest Ability modifier.

name: Manifest Locus
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: Designate an unoccupied space as a Manifest Locus. The space is treated as occupied by you for opportunity attacks. Enemies within 5 ft of the locus have disadvantage on checks to Disengage. You may move the locus 5 ft when you move.

name: Pincer Pressure
effect: The creature cannot gain advantage on attack rolls and provokes opportunity attacks even if it Disengages until the start of your next turn.

name: Coordinated Strike
effect: Deal +1d8 force damage and push or pull the target 5 ft without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Shared Watch
effect: Impose disadvantage on the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you may move your Manifest Locus up to 5 ft.

name: Encroaching Presence
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: The area within 5 ft of you and your Manifest Locus is difficult terrain for hostile creatures. The first hostile creature that enters either area takes force damage equal to your Manifest Ability modifier.

name: Fractured Flank
effect: On a failed save, the creature’s speed becomes 0 and it takes 2d6 force damage. On a success, its speed is reduced by 10 ft.

name: Talon Dash
effect: Move up to 20 ft in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. The first creature you hit this turn takes +1d6 force damage.

name: Predator’s Leap
effect: You may move up to 10 ft toward another hostile creature. If you end adjacent, you gain advantage on your next attack against it this turn.

name: Momentum Surge
effect: When you reduce a creature to 0 HP or score a critical hit, you may make one additional weapon attack. This attack cannot trigger this effect again.

name: Raptor’s Focus
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: Choose a creature within 30 ft. You have advantage on opportunity attacks against it, and it has disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than you while within your reach.

name: Wind-Carried Strike
effect: You may move 5 ft and reroll the attack against the same target, using the new roll.

name: Skyfall Descent
effect: Creatures within 5 ft of your landing point take 2d8 force damage and are knocked prone on a failed save; half damage and no prone on a success.

name: Anchor the Line
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: You cannot be knocked prone, have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws, and hostile creatures within 5 ft have their speed reduced by 10 ft.

name: Winged Shelter
effect: The ally gains resistance to the triggering attack’s damage. If they still take damage, you may move 5 ft toward the attacker without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Interdict Movement
effect: On a failed save, the creature’s speed becomes 0. On a success, its speed is reduced by 10 ft.

name: Guardian Bulwark
duration: until start of your next turn
effect: You and allies gain +1 AC. The first time each affected creature takes damage, reduce that damage by your Manifest Ability modifier.

name: Stand Unbroken
effect: Reroll the saving throw and use the new result. If it succeeds, you gain temporary HP equal to your Bound Vanguard level.

name: Lasting Presence
effect: Allies within 5 ft gain +1 to saving throws. Hostile creatures within 5 ft have disadvantage on checks to shove, grapple, or forcibly move creatures other than you.

name: Sovereign Strike
effect: Deal +2d8 force damage. The target cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.

name: Shattering Advance
effect: Move up to 30 ft in a straight line, moving through hostile creatures’ spaces. The first hostile creature you pass through takes 2d8 force damage and must succeed on a Strength save or be knocked prone.

name: Relentless Manifestation
effect: The first ME you spend each turn costs 0. You may apply Manifest Strike twice per turn. Does not stack with other cost-reduction effects.

name: Dominion Aura
effect: Hostile creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than you and disadvantage on saving throws against your Manifest Techniques.

name: Final Intercession
effect: You drop to 1 HP instead and the triggering creature takes 3d10 force damage. Unleashed Will ends and you gain 1 level of exhaustion.
